Prompt: How can I search for pet-friendly places on Petofy based on my location?
Response: Simply add your location in the location box, visit the pet-friendly places section, and you can explore all the pet-friendly places near you.

Prompt: Is there any place nearby where I can celebrate the birthday of my pet?
Response: Yes, many pet-friendly restaurants offer birthday celebrations for your pets. Simply add your location in the location box, visit the pet-friendly places section, and explore all the nearby pet-friendly places for you.

Prompt: Do any of the pet-friendly places host special events or gatherings for pets?
Response: Yes, some pet-friendly places listed on Petofy may host special events or gatherings for pets. Explore individual place profiles for details on upcoming events and activities. For detailed information, please contact us at https://petofy.com/contact-us or call us at +(91) 6399-638-639.

Prompt: What are the opening hours of the pet-friendly places listed on Petofy?
Response: The opening hours of pet-friendly places may vary. Check individual place profiles on Petofy for specific details on opening hours and plan your visit accordingly.
